sect4.title: awk
sect4.para: awk is a symbolic link to gawk.

sect4.title: gawk, gawk-3.1.1
sect4.para: gawk is the GNU implementation of awk, a pattern scanning and processing language.

sect4.title: igawk
sect4.para: igawk is a shell script which gives gawk the ability to include files.

sect4.title: pgawk, pgawk-3.1.1
sect4.para: pgawk is the profiling version of gawk.
